sentences.en: a work of outstanding artistic merit
sentences.cn: 具有杰出艺术价值的作品

sentences.en: All outstanding bills will be paid by the previous occupants.
sentences.cn: 一切未支付的账单将由原住户偿付。

sentences.en: an area of outstanding natural beauty
an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
Derartu is an outstanding athlete and deserved to win.
sentences.cn: 德拉尔图是位优秀的运动员，赢得比赛也是理所当然。

sentences.en: Exquisite workmanship is the outstanding characteristic of these artistic handwork's.
sentences.cn: 工艺精美是这些工艺品的突出特点.

sentences.en: He is one of the outstanding pig - breeders of the commune.
sentences.cn: 在公社里,他是数得着的养猪能手.

sentences.en: He is unarguably an outstanding man.
sentences.cn: 他无疑是一位杰出人士。

sentences.en: He was cited many times for his outstanding service.
sentences.cn: 他因出色的服务而多次得到嘉奖.

sentences.en: His citation says he showed outstanding and exemplary courage.
sentences.cn: 颁给他的嘉奖令称他表现出非凡的勇气，堪为表率。

sentences.en: Patrick Devlin was an outstanding judge and brilliant jurist.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克·德夫林是一位杰出的法官和出色的法律专家。

sentences.en: The boy who won the scholarship was a quite outstanding student.
sentences.cn: 那个获得奖学金的男孩是个相当杰出的学生.

sentences.en: The company is an outstanding example of a small business that grew into a big one.
sentences.cn: 该公司是小企业成长为大公司的突出例子。

sentences.en: The girl who won the scholarship was quite outstanding.
sentences.cn: 得奖学金的女孩是相当杰出的.

sentences.en: The total debt outstanding is $70 billion.
sentences.cn: 未偿债务总额达700亿美元。

sentences.en: We mustn't belittle her outstanding achievement.
sentences.cn: 我们一定不能小瞧了她所取得的杰出成就。

sentences.en: You have to pay your outstanding bill before joining the scheme.
sentences.cn: 在参加该项目之前必须结清余账。

phrases.tran_cn: 流通在外的股票；已发行股票
净发股票；流通在外股票

trans.tran_cn: 优秀的，突出的，未解决的，未支付的
